title: INdesign not playing with word
content:
Hi, I am trying to copy and past words from word into indesign, but now my indesign is not keeping the character fromating in the text box. What have I done to change this....

 [‹ Font Advise Sought for a 'Frutiger'esque type font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122000055/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40549 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Universal" font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122000055/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47267 "Go to next forum topic")
author: danamax

comments.content:
Hi Dana,

check your InDesign preferences. There you can toggle the settings for ‘clipboard options’, or whatever it is called in English.  
For longer text passages, it might be more comfortable to import (= place) the text file like an image.  
F
